(n, k) = map(int, input().split(' '))
arr = [int(x) - 1 for x in input().split()]
m = 0 - -n // (k - 1)
gp = [[] for x in range(n)]
ct = 0
for x in arr:
    gp[x].append(ct)
    ct += 1
c = 1
L = [x for x in range(n)]
ans = [[] for x in range(n)]
while L:
    y = []
    for x in L:
        y.append([gp[x][c], x])
    y.sort(key=lambda x: x[0])
    for x in y[:m]:
        ans[x[1]].append(gp[x[1]][c - 1])
        ans[x[1]].append(x[0])
    L = []
    for x in y[m:]:
        L.append(x[1])
    c += 1
for x in ans:
    print(x[0] + 1, x[1] + 1)
